text: You have ascended to Daemonhood and are now feared by many as a Daemon Prince of Chaos.
The Undivided Prince represents Chaos in its entirety: no single Ruinous Power holds influence over this being.
The Armoured Prince of Chaos has donned armour made by Chaos itself. Ruinous energy pours out, corrupting those around him.
This Scorched Prince of Chaos has been through a literal trial by fire, and can withstand a great deal of punishment without flinching.
The Armaments of Chaos grant you the strength of Chaos itself. These are the tools of destruction.
The Fanged Prince's skin has exposed bone, spikes and fangs erupting from it â€“ yet more tools to use in combat.
The Burning Prince of Khorne is hotter-headed than any fire from within, his blaze burning anyone who approaches.
The Bloodthirsty Prince of Khorne hungers for battle and for blood, which will undoubtedly be split for the Blood God.
The Armaments of War will grant you the strongest armour, forged in the realm of Khorne Himself.
The Fierce Prince wears trophies of foes bested in combat. If you falter, expect your flesh to be worn as a prize!
The Enlarged Prince of Nurgle has grown larger than most. This great bulk of Daemonic energy is filled with the Fly Lord's glorious rot.
The Charitable Prince of Nurgle seeks to spread pox and decay to all those who have not experienced the pleasure of its glory.
The Armaments of Blight are enough to disgust most. These gifts are given by Nurgle so others may experience His delightful diseases.
The Foul Prince has become more grotesque over time, sufficient to grant him the unholy strength needed to cheat death itself.
The Radiant Prince of Slaanesh exudes desire and lust. Few are able to resist their urges when in their presence.
The Adorned Prince of Slaanesh wears armour of the highest quality. Take care not to lose yourself in its magnificent reflection!
The Armaments of Desire cause many heads to turn. All desire to know of the beauty that lies beneath...
With composure and grace, the Sensuous Prince flows through the heat of battle among friend and foe.
The Jewelled Prince of Tzeentch has been gifted many trinkets and jewels so they may have access to powers untold.
The Mystic Prince of Tzeentch has bathed in the fires of Tzeentch. His body now surges from the Winds of Magic flowing within it.
The Armaments of Change are enchanted by nature, allowing you to harness the Winds of Magic.
Despite his frailty, through the ages the Withered Prince has survived more than most.
This champion has completed the Trials of Fate. The Fateweaver holds no sway over the fate of this Daemon Prince.
